name: Fling Patrick!
description:
Follow the adventure of the unlucky dice, Patrick, as he rolls nat 1's and is tossed around by some otherworldly force.

CONTROLS

  • Mouse Left-Click to Pick Up Patrick and drag to and release to fling!
  • SPACEBAR when near an NPC to interact!
  • W or Up-Arrow to go into the background (on shaded area)
  • S or Down-Arrow to go into the foreground (on shaded area)
  • ESCAPE to quit the app.
  • R to reset position of Patrick to the center.

CREDITS / LINKS

  • Angela (aykim): Character Design / Assets / Art

  •  Clarissa (bluxyr): Environmental Design / Assets / Art
